H0.text: Which Scottish University was established as the world's first Mechanics Institute in 1821 . University of Edinburgh

H1.text: Which Scottish University was established as the world's first Mechanics Institute in 1821 . University of Glasgow

H2.text: Which Scottish University was established as the world's first Mechanics Institute in 1821 . University of Aberdeen

H3.text: Which Scottish University was established as the world's first Mechanics Institute in 1821 . Heriot Watt

A4.text: Heriot-Watt University (Scottish Gaelic: Oilthigh Heriot-Watt) is a public research university based in Edinburgh, Scotland. It was established in 1821 as the School of Arts of Edinburgh, the world's first mechanics' institute
